Header: Temple tusker attacks Prof. Wimalarathana Thera
Content: Bellanwila Wimalarathana Thera attacked by a temple tusker Venerable Prof. Bellanwila Wimalarathana Thera has been attacked by a temple elephant and is now admitted to the Intensive Care Unit of Kalubowila Hospital. The incident has occurred this morning when the Thera was serving food to 'Miyan Kumara' a tamed elephant at the temple. Later, the Thera was taken to Kalubowila Hospital and now the Thera is receiving treatment at the ICU.
